WorkItem.Description:
Steps to reproduce:

In .NET 3.5 in login of register screen, leave some fields empty and press enter.
Validation error Text like

The UserName field is required. 

appears.
This message cannot localized: I replaced all occurances of "is required" text with localized message, but this message still appears in english. 

How to localize this validation message ?
WorkItem.Summary: The ... field is required validation message cannot localized
